page.title: 12 Farms Around Blackwood
page.content: The Blackwood area includes Blackwood Pig Farm, Blackwood Hall (partly a chicken rearing farm), Blackwood House (arable and pig farming) and Whitemoor Mine. The land upon which the mine is sited used to to the owner of Whitemoor Farm. Blackwood House Farm contains a house and a barn and is built on a solidsquare about 80' by 70'.Blackwood Hall Farm has two houses and a flat, one courtyard, several chicken sheds, two stables and several paddocks.The chicken sheds are built on raised walls made of breeze blocks. These buildings are about 45' long, 15' high and 15' wide. Blackwood Pig Farm is slightly bigger than the chicken farm. The pig farm has many old buildings, built when B.O.C.M Silcock owned the farm.
